content.detailedDescription:
My girfriend and i were out on my front porch enjoying an unusually cool and clear night (for florida). something caught her eye and she got up and walked to the driveway and said (quite simply) "what in the hell is that?"
i looked up to see what can be loosely described as grey boomerang with red and white lights drifting across the sky. in the center was a cluster of tiny white lights that could almost be described like a disco ball. we watched it drift for about30 seconds going north to south and fade away. then, to our amazement, another one appeared following the same course as the first one. drifted for awhile then faded away. we stood in the driveway dumbfounded for about an hour looking for another one. nothing. then just before bed we went out for one last look. about ten minutes later here comes another one. except the sky was much darker and clearer now so it was much more well defined. it was illuminated much like a small watt light bulb seen through a lampshade. with the same cluster of tiny lights in the center. it must be noted that these were not like little dots in the sky. there were two helicopters in the area for the first two but none for the third one. i'm going out to get a video camera!
content.summary: Bizarre lights in boomerang shape.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 7:20pm on 10/1/2011 i along with my friend witnessed a bright star like object traveling at tremendous speed approximately 70 degrees above the horizon flying in a straight line heading south east for an estimated 30-40 seconds, it then made a sharp angle change of direction heading north east for an estimated 1-1m20 seconds. 

the light blinked out for 1-2 seconds then came back with equal intensity twice during the sighting. it did this once while heading east, and then again while heading north east. the total sighting length was approximately 2 minutes +/- 10 seconds as estimated.

during it's flight east it left a light streak behind it for approximately 1 second. the object appeared to go extremely fast and then slow down, yet still it was traveling with a high rate of speed. i estimated the total distance traveled before losing sight of it to be 4 feet to the east and 3 feet to the north east. the altitude of the object was high enough to be equal in size and color to a bright white star.

just before it changed direction i stepped inside my house and reached for a mini monocular to try to get a better look at it. the monocular was 4 feet from the door and within quick reach. the directional change took place right as i got back outside. total time to get the monocular is approximately 10 seconds on the high side. the object was traveling so fast i decided against trying to use the monocular because of the time it would take to focus and continued to watch the object until it disappeared from sight by quickly blinking out. after it blinked out i asked my friend if it had performed any other direction changes or movements while i reached for the monocular. he said it continued as i described it here, traveling fast in a straight line and slowing just a bit, then traveling fast again in the same direction until it's abrupt change of direction. one thing to note is when it changed direction it did so instantly, it did not make a turn, it was heading south east and then north east, that fast.

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? 
standing on the darkened porch talking to my friend. i had just looked up to stretch my neck when i noticed a bright star and then saw it move, i told my friend "hey check it out, it's a satellite." but when it changed its speed i began to question that and finally when it changed its direction i ruled it out completely.

2. what made you first notice the object?
it appeared to be a star traveling extremely fast across the sky.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
possibly a satellite until it changed its rate of speed and finally direction.
 
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
please see above.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
initially curiosity followed by amazement,when i first noticed it. then wonder and intrigue.
 
6. how did you lose sight of the object? it blinked out of sight. it was there and then just gone.
content.summary: Bright star like object travelling extremely high and fast

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were driving north on i-5 at around 2:30am, location siskiyou mountains. 
the road was quiet on both sides and it was a very dark night.  we were traveling up to washington state for thanksgiving with family.  i was driving and he was asleep in the passenger seat reclined. 
there is a wide parkway between the n and s lanes of i-5 as you go through the region.  there are many miles of increasingly rolling hills and curves in the road to the top of the pass.   
when i first noticed the objects, they appeared very low on the horizon and must have been quite far away because the first thing i thought was that they were very bright orange reflector lights showing that the road will curve to the right.  i was going about 75 mph and in the few seconds, i registered three things, 1.  i started to drive to the right since the "reflector lights were indicating that road was going to be going to the right soon"  2. i noticed as i did so, that the white lines on the road were not turning gently to the right they were turning gently to the left and that a truck's headlights were just starting to show through the parkway coming from the north and from the left of us.  3. i slowed down due to the confusion, then saw the orange lights cross the road about a 1/2 mile away and then get much larger and much brighter.  at that moment i slowed to a complete stop on i-5, right in the middle of two lanes.  the lights traveled at an incredible speed, swooped up to the left about 40-50ft in the air like a steep arch, at this point directly up and to my left, they were so bright their light lit up the entire parkway, trees were outlined and the road was completely lit up. then they swooped down directly in front of the windshield, if i was standing outside the car i could have touched them they were so close.  the combination of my slowing down to stop and the light woke up my boyfriend, just in time to see 9 orbs, about 4 ft in diameter, with multi colors, (but emitting a clean clear white light the entirely lit up the inside of the car but didn't hurt our eyes.)  careen in formation, one behind the other, but not exactly spaced apart time wise, they flew past the car, across the road, swooped up directly to our right perhaps 60-70ft, and then, they started navigating through the tops of the trees, avoiding tree trunks (a motion similar to a curving snake) lighting up the entire tree tops until within seconds we couldn't see any light anymore.  my boyfriend swore after picking his chin up off his chest because he was so shocked.

the orbs emitted a light that looked alive inside the perfect circles. 
they also emitted a tail, streaks of light behind each one that flew past the windshield.  again we were only about 5 feet away from them and could see them fully in the few seconds that they were in view.  i still can't successfully described the colors i saw inside the light, it was multi colored looked like pure energy. the intense white light didn't bother my eyes enough to be able to look right at them.  the remaining sensation was that they were actually alive. in the end i would guess the total experience took about 45 seconds to a minute, and that changed my life in terms of belief in things no one has been able to explain.  the only comfort i get in terms of the lasting mystery,  is that there have been multiple and credible video and witness reports that can verify what we saw was real, was not  ball lightning or any naturally explained phenomena. i wish i knew what it was that we saw.  i can only guess that it was "alive" because it had the ability to navigate and negotiate through the tree line and not hit the trunks and because of it's pulsating energy.  most amazing thing i've ever seen.  my boyfriend was 
quite literally shocked and did not want to talk about at all, his response was to basically not talk about it out of fear i guess.  my response has been to keep watching and learning. this happened many years ago and i'm glad to see more information and witness stories than ever provided by sites like this.
content.summary: Orbs over i-5

content.detailedDescription: Went outside and my son said look up over there we all looked (there were five of us), i said at first it's because of the clouds, then keep looking and to my amazment there were lights moving north! the more i looked i could see clusters moving in the same direction i called someone 30 miles south but they could not see anything besides stars, never seen anything like that in my life other then on youtube i did not have a camera, wondering if anyone seen what we seen last night.
content.summary: About twenty to thrity lights moving north towards canada

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving home from dinner and i noticed an orange fireball rising up from the horizon.
it was travelling almost perfectly from north to south.  all you could really see was the v-shaped plume 
of fire behind it.  if you extended your arm fully out in front of you, the plume appeared the size of your 
pinky fingernail.  it was travelling straight, at a steady pace.  what was really odd was that after it
traversed the sky and went out of site, about 20 seconds later, another one appeared from the same origin,
travelling the exact same path / pace as the first one.  even stranger, this happened a total of four times!
i have separate videos of each, but attached is a small sample of some of the steadiest video i have,
with a good point of reference (tree / streetlight) so you can get an idea of the pace it was moving at.
content.summary: Four consecutive fireballs

content.detailedDescription: We left from my mother n laws house drove up the driveway. it was about 8:25pm oct 1 2011. my father n law was on a 4 wheeler right behind us. and i shut off the vehicle. we got out and i looked toward the northwest, saw a bright light moving at a high rate of speed. the light seem to be moving in a linear motion across the sky. it made no noise. i got excited told my wife and father n law look up there in the sky.  they saw the same thing. wife said it was a plane, and i said no its not a plane. i see planes often and was no plane. we continue to watch as the light seem to dissipate, (faded out). then i turned and asked what was that? i looked again the light appeared again. the light seem to decend down, kinda like a slow fall. the light again faded out and it was gone. i think that my wife and father n law was stunned. they had no explaination, but after the event i notice a aircraft, or maybe a chopper. not for sure i know that what ever the aircraft was it had a propeller sound, flew in the same direction as the object. it may have been maybe about 5-7 mins after the object was observed. but the experience was like shock and awe. but this is what we saw. and i know for a fact it was no airplane or helicopter. i witness lots of commercial airtraffic in my yard daily and also nightly.
content.summary: The bright light seem to move very fast

content.detailedDescription: my brother and i have been seeing these ufos everynight. the first thing that makes them so very easily noticeable is it looks like a star that is flashing every color in the spectrum. i thought right away it was a ufo because stars don't flash and pulsate many different colors. it is a pulsating object that looks stationary with the naked eye, but when in the camera lens, it is moving at light speed it moves so fast it looks like it is at a standstill. after taking several photos, you can see that they are doing speeds and manuevers we don't have the ability to do. you just have to see the pics and come to gerald and look in the sky and you will see what i am talking about. i want to know what they are, it isn't something that we should take lightly.  please contact me and when you see the photos i took i'm sure you will definitely want to come see for yourselves. the pictures are 100 percent legit and evidence there are many ufos everywhere and more are present everyday! they scare me and make me very uncomfortable because you can tell they are here to stay for what i don't know, after me and my family watched for awhile, i saw another one come and appear close to the one we were watching and well after seeing more than one my niece got a bit scared and went inside. so we lost sight when we went inside the house.
content.shape: Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: My family and i saw and have been seeing ufos for a long time.  on this night and from everynight since then we have been seeing them more and more are appearing everyday.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down dunlap in central phoenix when i saw two bright green orbs floating near the mountains. at first i thought they were traffic lights but then i noticed how high up they were in the sky, and that they were actually quite large and were moving slowly in a straight line. after floating along in that straight line for about 15 minutes they both stopped at exactly the same time, and then shot upwards and disappeared. i immediately felt dizzy and sick to my stomach and had to pull over to throw up.
content.summary: Two bright green orbs floating over central phoenix moving slowly then shooting up and disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
I have been debating whether or not to report this sighting. it happened on friday, september 16th, 2011. (this is from my view in campbell, ca) i was sitting on my bed watching tv at 2300 hrs when i heard helicopters flying over. i tend to ignore them since i live directly under the moffet field air path, but decided to get up and look out the window since it was pretty loud. it sounded like two or three choppers flying over. when i looked out the blinds, i saw a three bright white lights evenly spaced apart flying overhead with a plane and two choppers chasing it. they all headed from san jose towards the santa cruz mountains (n to se). i thought that was pretty amazing, but it happened so fast (they were all moving very fast) that i couldn't get it on video or any pictures. since they flew over fast, i just went back to the bed to continue watching tv.

then at 0000 (midnight), i heard the same sounds again, but coming back (se to n). i ran to the bedroom window saw them coming back. i saw this same "triangle" moving fast back towards san jose being obviously chased by a chopper. i ran through the house, grabbed my video camera and went out the living room patio door. i looked up just in time to see the object still with it's three white lights (still evenly spaced) flying directly towards another chopper. and in fact, the chopper had to make a hard left dodge to avoid a mid-air collision with the object. then, the object and two choppers chased it towards san jose (n). once again, it happened so fast that i couldn't get my camera on quick enough to catch this event.

the reason why i have debated on whether or not to report it is because i have been hearing about moffet field testing a recon spy plane in the area. however, i did the research on it and found that the test plane is a little bit bigger than a cessena, and in no way even comes close to what i saw. it was definitely a triangle.
content.summary: Triangle chased from san jose to santa cruz mountains, then back an hour later

content.detailedDescription: Around 200 yards east of the ne tip of dean lake there is a small lake in a private wooded lot. my wife and i walked the trail around that lake and saw an orange glowing/flickering triangles moving reasonably fast across the sky two days in a row at about the same time. they were moving in a straight line at a speed which seemed faster than airplanes, but not near as fast as a shooting star. they were visible as they moved for ~20 seconds. they were flickering like fire, orange in color and seemed to have an aura around them giving off the impression they were on fire. each one seemed to be about an inch across from our perspective, but appeared to be pretty high in the sky. so i imagine they were fairly large aircraft. the the atmosphere was calm and eerie and experience caused my wife to burst into tears and beg me to take her out of there as fast as possible.
content.summary: Orange glowing triangles east of dean lake

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were in the back yard stargazing. she noticed and pointed out a star-like dot of light moving across the night sky from southeast to northwest. i've seen satellites many times, and this looked very much like one -- a solid, unwavering, star-like light, moving steadily in a straight pattern across the night sky. my wife thought it moved a little too fast to be a satellite; that i'm not sure about. i saw it as a whitish light, like a star. she saw it reddish.

what i am sure is it was not an airplane or helicopter, much too far up in the night sky to be that, and this light didn't blink.  

about 30 seconds or so into tracking it, we both saw to our astonishment it split into two dots of light, very close together and moving parallel to one another at the same speed. my wife, who thought the initial sighting was reddish, thought the second light was whitish. this second light continued for about five seconds, then one of the lights seemed to fade out (not cut out abruptly), then it was back to the initial light.

everything about it was like a satellite -- except i've never seen a satellite suddenly split into two dots of light.
content.summary: Small star-like light moving like satellite. but then it split briefly into two lights moving parallel to each other before going back to just one.

content.detailedDescription: I was in grade 8 and we were driving back from prince rupert bc to smithers bc after our volleyball zones. there were 8 of us (including me) in the vehicle. we were driving along a straight stretch and at the end of the straight stretch we noticed a green light about 1 km behind us and thought "that's funny, none of us saw that when we drove by there." but not thinking anything of it we drove on, when we came to the next straight stretch the object was suddenly about 20 feet behind us and 20 feet in the air (very rough estimates). the object was about 15-20 feet across and im guessing 10 feet top to bottom. we could not actually see the object, the light it was emitting was so bright all we could see was white light and green radiating all around us. this object followed us for about 10 minutes or so and then suddenly disappeared, all of us were shocked and not too sure what we had seen. i still keep in touch with everyone that was in the vehicle, we were also next to a water source (the ocean).
content.summary: Green light followed van for 10 minutes, about 20 feet behind us

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 8:30 pm and i went to take my dog outside..  something caught my eye over the trees in the nw corner of my house moving s.   at first, i thought it was a really large hawk gliding over, but when i focused in on it, it was a transparent, boomerang shaped object.  but it had straight edges on the object, not curved, like a boomerang.  anyhow, i saw it move across the sky, completely silent, maintained it's altitude and course.  it was  translucent, like it was made of water.  it looked like the surface of a pond.  there were no lights.  i watched it move across the sky for about 10-15 seconds until it sort of blended in with the color of the sky.  the other stars in the sky appeared smeary when the object passed over them, then they would re-appear perfectly clear, that's how i could tell the shape.  i couldnt judge how large it was, because i couldnt get a feel of it's altitude, but i got the impression it was about 1/4 mile west of my position.   no matter what altitude this was, it appeared bigger than any airplane i've seen.

ive never seen anything like it before.  i am prior air force, i used to be an air traffic controller, i've been around airplanes since i was a baby.  this was nothing i have ever seen before.  i expected noise, there was none.  it moved across the sky very slowly.  it was unbelievable.  i don't know what i saw, but it looked the some computer graphics of a cloaking device in a movie.  but it wasn't a movie.  crazy.
content.summary: Object flew in perfectly straight path from north to south until it appeared to blend in with the sky

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Was outside smoking a cig, saw a bright light i saw a few mornings earlier.  the light was in a different part of the sky.  it also emitted two other objects that emitted colors that changed from red to yellow to white and green. also blinked.  looked in the area around the object and observed two more lights that did the same. objects are still in the sky.
content.summary: Object brightened then dimmed,ejected lights that changed colors

content.detailedDescription:
I was reclining on a lawn chair on my patio at aproximatley 2120 hrs on 30sep2011.  i was relaxing, having a cigarette, (i had not been drinking, and i do not use or abuse any legal or illegal drugs or prescriptions), looking up at the stars as i usually do on a cool autumn evening.  i saw, traveling directly north to south, either 7 or 9 lights, each one somewhat cross shaped, flying in a perfect "v" formation.  this light group appeared from the north and were traveling perfectly south, then just before becoming obscured by trees, the light group/"v" formation changed direction by approximately 25 to 30 degrees towards the west. they were traveling at least 150 mph.  they made absolutely no noise whatsoever.  i live on the flight path of kc135's that have had their landing gears replaced and or rebuilt on hill air force base, utah.  these lights were flying as fast as any boing jet that i have seen in the area.  these lights were flying much faster than any crop duster airplane that has ever flown over my home.  i have lived in my home for 10 years, and i am retired navy.  these lights glowed, unlike any bird or anything that i have ever seen before.  these lights maintained a perfect "v" formation, even when performing a directional adjustment.  these lights were silent, and the lights never wavered, meaning that since they were somewhat crossed shaped, the "wings", if they had been birds, never moved.  i have never seen a flock of birds that could travel at 150 mph+, not flap its wings, have a flock that never broke perfect formation, and then turn, staying in perfect formation, 75 feet from tip of the "v" to tip of the "v". this was not birds, and i have never, or ever heard of a silent aircraft before, especially being as close as close to the ground as it was. i cannot believe that even the u.S. govt, even if they have developed a silent aircraft, could be seen from the ground, at 400-500 feet, silent, moving that fast, and i saw no outline of a craft between the lights. 
what more can i say.
content.summary: A set of 7 or 9 lights, each one cross shaped, flying in a

content.detailedDescription: Hello everyone; this is what i had seen on friday night september 30th 2011... this u.F.O. sighting happenned on friday night at around 11:17 p.M... i was visiting my friend that night at his house, i decided to go outside to get some fresh air, when i just happenned to notice a very strange light in the night sky within a couple of miles from where i was at in longmont, colorado. longmont colorado has a population of around 75-thousand residents. this sighting happenned on the very end of this city, on the far south end of town. my friend wasn't outside at the same time that i was for him to witness this u.F.O. sighting. anyway that night on friday september 30th 2011, i just happenned to notice a very bright white lights that were in the shape of a v-shape triangle slowley heading south east of longmont, colorado at a steady crusing speed. this object wasn't going real fast like most u.F.O.'s that are reported to travel. it was going a steady speed of what a normal twin engine airplane woul'd travel it seemed. this v-shaped object that i seen that night was a real solid object that wasn't an airplane, or a sattelite, or any known type of a natural man-made objects that we have here on our planet! the bright lights on this u.F.O. object were very bright white lights, the lights were lighted up in a v-shape pattern. the lights seemed to be pulsating in a strange pattern. i only had a short time to view this object before it dissapeared behind the trees at my friend's place before i lost full view of it. when i spotted this u.F.O. object i was tottally stunned at what i was seeing with my own two eyes. i rushed in my friends house where he was at to explain to him what i had just seen, and wittnessed! my friend was on the phone talking to his girlfriend, and by the time i finnally got him to see what i had just wittnessed this object was moving over the trees in his back yard to where he couldn't get a full view of this u.F.O. before it dissappeared out of full view behind the trees in his back yard. i didn't have my cell phone on me at the time of this sighting, otherwise i woul'd have taken a picture recording of it. there has been alot of these type of u.F.O. reports all over the areas of not only the longmonr area, but also in laffaette, colorado back in march of this year 2011, there was a major u.F.O. sighting that hundreds of residents of this town located within fifteen miles of the city of longmont, colorado where i live at and have seen this u.F.O. that i have mentioned above. the laffaette, colorado u.F.O. sighting was on the major news on channel 9-news, and other news stations through out colorado. hundreds of people wittnessed back in march, 2011, a v-shapped traingle shapped object hovering still over laffeatte, colorado the night of their major sighting here in colorado. this u.F.O. sighting is filmed on u-tube, and this u.F.O. hovered still above the town of laffeatte, colorado for at least close to a half an hour. there has been many other u.F.O. reports that other people have video taped with their cam-corders this year in 2011 here in colorado. "these are "real" u.F.O. sighting's folks!!! including what i witnessed to on september 30th 2011... it seems very strange that the closer that we are getting to the suppossed mayan end times date of december 21st 2011, which is on a friday by the way, the more every day average people are wittnessing u.F.O. objects in the skys, either in the daytime, and night time both! there are on average hundreds of these sightings every month all around the world! we all need to take these u.F.O. sightings "very seriousley!!! i don't know why these objects are showing up every where lateley. do these extra-terrestrials have a plan to invade our planet earth, or are they just simpley watching, and observing all of our cities around the world??? why all of a sudden are these reported u.F.O. objects showing up almost in every major city all around the world recentley. i was born in the earley 60's and through out all of my life i have never wittnessed or seen anything like i had seen recentley in the sky! anyway thank's for reading my true story of what i just wittnessed in the night sky, of what i believe is an honest to god's "real u.F.O. sighting" that i had just seen and wittnessed!!! go on the internet on "yahoo" and type in denver, colorado u.F.O. sightings in 2011" and check out not only the reported major u.F.O. sighting that i had mentioned above in laffeatte, colorado and you will see the actuall cam-corder video taped earlier this year in 2011... but also on yahoo, type in the words u.F.O. sighting's in denver colorado on august 23rd 2011, and september 2011... there is a man who has many live camera videos that he has taken here in the denver, colorado area of major u.F.O.'s that he has on his video-camera taken in the daytime, with his high power spotting scope with a digital camera-video recorder attached to it, plus at night time too! in august, and september 2011, also all year long, from march of 2011 this man with the nickname on u-tube he goes by the name of "magnet flipper" look this name up also on u-tube and see all of his "fantastic-u.F.O.Videos there! with his spotting scope he has many fantastic video camera shots of these u.F.O.'s... as i close my full true story of my personal u.F.O. sighting on september 30th 2011, i wan't to mention to all of the non-believers out there that if you don't think that u.F.O.'s exist, or another higher intelligence higher than ours here on earth exists, sooner or later you can very possibbley have an encounter with a strange object in the skys too if you woul'd just look up in the sky when you are out in your back yard, or anywhere either in the day time, or night time, i can almost guarentee it that sooner, or later you will spot something up in the sky that doesn't look like an airplane, or something normal on our earth that we have man-made today! don't forget to alway's have your cell phone camera ready or cam-corder by your side just in case you do happen to be in the right place at the right time to wittness an exciting event such as my u.F.O. sighting and hundreds of others of average every day people that see these objects in the skys! don't forget to look up these u.F.O. sightings on "yahoo" that i listed above, then you be the judge of if you believe that u.F.O.'s are real and if they trueley do exist!!! ken, of longmont, colorado.
content.summary: I just happenned to be outside over visiting a friend when i spotted this triangle shapped u.F.O. on friday evening september 30th 2011...

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my van, when i was looking in the sky at some weird object and colors. i saw a silver reflective surface (the bottom only) and it had green lights all around the bottom of the ufo and a red light blinking in the middle. i actually saw one about 7 years ago same place too.
content.summary: Ufo sighted near m st. park

content.detailedDescription: At exactly 8:30 this evening i witnessed a ghostly boomerang shape ufo traveling from west to east.  the moon was just coming into view from my point which allowed me to see it clearly.  the shape was easily discernable.  traveling at high speed and was only able to see it for about 5 seconds and i was not able to get out of the chair fast enough to follow the flight path, plus i have trees blocking the view.  several neighbors were outside during the event, but have not yet spoken with them to see if they witnessed it.  as mentioned above, the ufo was ghostly in color and blended in with the sky almost like cloaking, but it did block the stars as it traveled.  it is a very clear night and myself and a a couple of neighbors have fires going, but it was not smoke.  it made now sound and unable to determine the altitude of the ufo, but seemed large in size from my view point.
content.summary: Ghostly boomerang shape blending in with the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
**please don't use my real name**

i will tell you my story.

well, here it goes, i am a 41yo who had a heart transplant in 2001 and a stroke which left my right side partially limited. i was living in san jose and had a fantastic position with an international hi-tech firm doing project management in palo alto. it was a great future in store for me, and i was very excited to be a part of it. i am living north now in mckinleyville, ca.

from what i can remember in the past:

5 years old: i was climbing on the outer railing when i fell off the second floor and right before i landed on my back on the tiles, i felt my body being set down very slowly. being five i thought that was really neat and ran into the kitchen to tell my grandmother who got angry and scolded me telling my "you're full of "cazzata" which translates to "bull s****" and scolded me to my room. i never forgot that moment even for a second. 

at the age of 24: i was away at collage and living in an old c.1894 house with four other students. for about two months at least 2 mornings per week i had a series of waking up and being completely unable to move anything except for my eyes for approx 30 minutes. another thing was the "weight" that heavily pressed my body into the mattress, it felt like someone was on top of me. that was a disturbing times but it ceased at two months. not ever was i into 'ghosts' but that made me serious about wondering if they really exist. i searched the old house at humboldt state university's library and found that the 1894 house was built right over the ashes of a previous building.  the wondering about a ghost faded as i was in an intensive program that needed my focus.

2 years ago: i woke up in my bed and looked at my watch seeing that three days had passed with no recollection of anything. i was extremely upset about it and went to my doctor who took a blood test and everything was normal.  i did not tell him about why i was so frazzled. in addition i had multiple dreams where i was unable to move except for turning my head. it was a very strange room with two other tables with people laying on them and again there was a being 8-9 feet tall wearing an outfit with a hood and shielding for the face working on the body to my right. i can recall turning my head to the left where small rectangle windows looking down at clam beach from i guess around 7000 feet, just a guess. during the two years i had multiple dreams like that.

the last week: the last night for the third time in the past week i dreamt of being in an underground 'lab?' or some kind of very large underground facility 'people' of two types. one type was 8-9 feet tall and the other was 'human-like' who can communicate using their minds. (i feel like i'm going crazy.) they were very calm and 'loving.' there are dozens of windows in the rock where the 'humans' would live, they would open into the rock. i would wake up and fall right back into the same dream. i have noticed new skin-marks and two new tiny scars. 

i live alone, my family is in so. california.

that's my story and you may do what you like with it, but again, please do not use my name.
content.summary: Abduction

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of 17 oct 2005, my video(15 frames) showed a flexible capsule shape ufo shoot a large light beam downward to alighted a team 8(?)of small visitors on my roof( see the attached picture).
 . this case is one of my long term visitation, more details from: 

[link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg. please note: that links to other sites will be removed]
content.summary: Ufo shoot a large light beam downward to alighted

content.detailedDescription: Crystal clear saturday morning. five of us sitting at breakfast table which has panoramic bay window view to the south. three of us saw streaking silver / gray object going from easterly to southwest while descending. very fast speed. speed caused a vapor trail behind object. appeared to be several miles from us. i am a private pilot so have a decent idea of distance in air. we live on the east texas and louisiana border apx 2 air miles from the border, the object appeared to be in louisiana airspace over eastern louisiana.
content.summary: Streaking through clear morning sky. very fast. looked like something falling from sky. large.

content.detailedDescription: I went to shut my back door when i saw the stars were particularily bright, so i stepped out to take a good look, directly above i saw somthing moving in an odd pattern, at forst i thought it was a hazy kind of star but it took some shap when my eyes focused, sort of triangular. at first it was moving back and forth from two points, i thought it looked like headlamps reflecting off cloud but there is no cloud and it was an odd path for a plane to take. i have been watching for over an hour and it has since started maving in a rough figure of eight, sometimes speeding up and it seems to move slightyl across the sky as it does this. i'm the only one here and i'm too frightened to knock on any neighbours doors as it's late.
content.summary: Starlike objest

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying in my backyard was even playing with my phone and it was as if i had indicated in which direction to look.The first thing i saw was a light red color but because of the distance of the object, which at first seemed like like me and thought it was a plane or satellite since i've seen often.But when i realized how fast it moved dude. the address of the object was coming from northwest to east, but suddenly a sharp twist by changing its direction towards the southeast.It was the sudden change in the direction that made me understand that it was not a plane or satellite.That was also when i get to see northern light proceeded from a more intense but more rare this light was a blue flash but changed to white.This object was shining moments and then went dark but when he was no longer shine in the same place, it was like in just a matter of seconds progressed a great distance.Which was verifiable at the time because after 3 appearances progress to reach the first red object above.It seemed as if the red object was to escape the second blue object which appeared to be larger because the light emitted was bigger than the other object.I was on the slope of the whole process until it achieves currencies.
it is not the only sighting i've had in my city. throughout the month of september i had five sightings and all differently.But it seems as if no one else would notice if i am not the only one who has this kind of event in my city i have mentioned to people i care about, and no one gives me a solid answer.The fifth sighting was very surprising when i can not say but if i can describe the phenomenon.The object was orange hue and came from the direction that i was outside on the patio with a cigarette and looking up to heaven to see him succeed, but at that moment i felt like i was not afraid locked but felt as if trying to communicate me it was at that moment when the object back and began to whirl about me and then proceed with your order rumbo.El looked very close as about 800 or 1000 meters.After that experience i have noticed that there has been a shift in my consciousness. and i want to know if it's normal.
not by attaching photos or videos because i do not have video cameras alone with my cell phone but it fails to capture the images. i excited about this phenomenon but also i have fear.I had never in my life seen or experienced so far experience so i remained incredulous.That's something that i can share. their own criteria to judge nobody forces them to believe.
content.summary: 2 objects followed by another one

content.detailedDescription:
September 29, 2011

i was with my girl friend outside the house, walking the dog.
around 12:15 am i looked at the clear sky and i saw an object flying; it had a boomerang shape, it was dark color and silent. i saw it for about 10 seconds and try to show her what i was seeing but she couldn't see it, then it disappeared, but about 10 seconds later, we both saw like a very bright shooting star and then few second later a second bright shooting star.

i was very surprised of what i saw, i didn't want to get inside the house and i kept looking at the sky while i was telling her my experience.
i told her to stay outside so we might see it again. she took the dog inside the house and came back to join me; we were there looking for 30 minutes, so we decided to laid down on the bed of my truck. we kept looking and looking..

around 1:35 am i saw it again and i could not believe it, i told her "there is!" and i pointed at it and we both start following the object.
it was like a boomerang shape but a little more rounded, it was dark color but a bit lighter than the sky, like it camouflages with the sky. the object had no sound at all, it was flying at the speed of an airplane or a bit slower, like it was scanning the area or checking around. it had no lights but seems to have like a line pattern that was lighter than the body.
it was flying from north to south and we saw it for about 30 seconds until it was very hard to spot it because of the lights of the street.
 my friend said, that before it disappeared, the object did a round/circle move. about 10 seconds later we saw like another very bright shooting star.
we were in shock and stayed there for another 30 minutes, but we never see it again. we went inside the house and try to draw the object, we ended up with similar drawings and similar details, the only difference according to her, the object had a soft glow at the backside.

i think this is one of the most amazing experience we ever had.

i try to called you yesterday morning, but the only way to contact you is thru here.

thanks,
hector
content.summary: Boomerang shape

content.detailedDescription: I was  solo backpacking and over the last couple years something was bothering my camp ocassionally so i set up a gamecam trap and caught this orb coming out of the sky straight for me (pic#1) as i lay in my tent.(pic#2) catches the orb passing over the gamecam and settling on me which is not visible(note the glow of the orb at the top of picture. (pic#3) shows the orb rocketing away between the far pines. 6 seconds between photo #1 and photo #3
content.summary: Orb b-lines straight for me in my tent and lands on me and then zips off.

content.detailedDescription: I checked my security camaras the other morning to see what was on it from the night before . well the video tells the story .
content.summary: Ufo flys throu my yard

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had just returned home from a 4th of july celebration at our daughter and son in law's house. i went out on our back deck to smoke a cigarette at exactly 10:00 p.M. i was facing east. i noticed a bright orange light through the trees and at first thought it was the moon. i then noticed that it was moving. i then thought that it could be the landing lights of an airliner. we are located on a flight path for the kansas city international airport and we often see the aircraft approaching the airport. after seeing this object for a short period of time i realized that their were no beams of light that are often seen on the aircarft and also i could tell that the whole object was a very bright orange. it was moving from south to north and it was rock steady in it's movement. i kept waiting to hear a sound from engines but it was absolutely quiet. after a few seconds it cleared the tree and came into full view. i kept trying to make it into an airplane of some sort but i knew without a doubt that it wasn't anything like i had ever seen. after a few seconds i noticed that there were a row of bright white ligts (small) starting to appear on a lateral line running from the front of the object (stating maybe a quarter of the way back from the front and extended about halfway back along the object). these white lights were small, bright and sharp. at first i thought thay maybe they were the lights on the end of an aircrafts wing as i was still trying to turn this object into an aircraft. the white lights started to appear one after another in rapid sequence starting from the front. the object kept moving at a relatively slow speed and completely quiet. it dissapeared behind trees as it moved north. it sent chills down my back and the hair on the back of my head stand up. i have never had anything do that to me. i couldn't explain what it was and it just wasn't normal in shape, color or anything else. i have set the time at 10:00 p.M. exactly but again it could have been 11:00 p.M.. whatever this thing was it was very strange. i have always had a hard time beleiving in ufo's or flying saucers but i have no explanation for this sighting. being at night i can not give any real estimate as of distance from my location or it's size. all i can say is that it appeared to be large and not that high in elevation from the ground. i would guess a few thousand feet but that is only a guess. i keep going out on the deck at nigt with my cell phone camera hoping to catch this or something like it but i have never seen it since. i will send photo's if i ever catch it again.
content.summary: Flat oval, bright orange. 3 to 5 bright small white lights down center line appeared late in sighting.

content.detailedDescription: We were stargazing with my class when i noticed a bright object in the night sky.  just when i focused on it it flashed real bright and then seamed to explode  and then move across the night sky.  i first thought it was a star. it moved in a linear fashion across the sky from east to west. i was very excited to see the object especially since it was so bright.  i lost sight of the object when it faded away and the light got dimmer.
content.summary: Out of the corner of my eye i saw something like an explosion. it had a black ring inside of it. it flashed three times

content.detailedDescription:
Thursday night i came home from church choir and went immediately to close the chickens door. i looked up coming back to the house because the stars were so clear. as i was walking to the house, i sensed a shadow and looked up. above me was a dark triangle shaped something that went slowly but directly to the southwest. my first thought was that it was the shape of geese flying but there was no noise or movement other than it's course. the shape was determined by it blocking out the stars. my next thought was that it must be a steath ship but it seemed low. i could not tell exactly how high above me it was but i sensed not too high. size?  maybe 10 feet across but i couldn't determing how high it was because it was so dark outside. the event lasted only minutes as the object went over the house and southwest. no sound or lights. at first, i felt a sense of fear but i let it go and curiosity took over. i can't explain why but i do not fear aliens from another planet or dimension.

i did contact the wildlife dept. in ft. collins to ask if geese fly at night and then called the local mufon office in greeley. cheryl gantz called me back and was most helpful and professional.
content.summary: I saw a dark triangle slow moving object at night over my farm.
